desc.f: Encryption Key Source. Possible values are: 'Microsoft.NetApp'.
desc.to: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.NetApp, Microsoft.KeyVault

principalId.desc: The principal ID of resource identity.

clientId.desc: The client ID of the identity.

principalId.desc: The principal ID of the identity.

userAssignedIdentities.desc: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the set of User Assigned identities that will be used with this storage account. The key is the ARM resource identifier of the identity. Only 1 User Assigned identity is permitted here.

v.desc: Shows the status of disableShowmount for all volumes under the subscription, null equals false
Identity used to authenticate with key vault.

principalId.desc: The principal ID (object ID) of the identity used to authenticate with key vault. Read-only.

userAssignedIdentity.desc: The ARM resource identifier of the user assigned identity used to authenticate with key vault. Applicable if identity.type has 'UserAssigned'. It should match key of identity.userAssignedIdentities.

sch.ov: Encryption Key Source. Possible values are: 'Microsoft.NetApp'.
sch.v: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.NetApp, Microsoft.KeyVault

keyVaultId.desc: UUID v4 used to identify the Azure Key Vault configuration

values.desc: KeyVault connection created but not in use
KeyVault connection in use by SMB Volume
